description:
I recently had to switch away from Feedly and was testing out the various readers for Linux.

The default installation and screenshots do no justice to how good this app actually is. It is highly configurable from fonts used, layout orientation etc. Easily imported my opml feed from feedly.

Highly recommended, just give yourself time to explore all the features within the menus.

Cudos to the development team.

This is my favorite desktop rss reader, and I have tried a lot on both Linux and Windoze.
My only reservation with this is that Quite does not include Tumblr in the sharing list.
I contacted the dev asking if they could add this, or how I might do it by going into the
code. I got no reply. My workaround was to install the AddToAny extension for
Chrome. But a direct Tumblr sharing button within Quite would be nice.

I use this app to read news from multiple sites. I find it better than Evolution RSS as it is much faster, browsing the news using the keyboard is very good since the selection is placed always in the middle. The integrated browser is functional and speeds up the whole process.

Finally found a replacement to GoogleReader - Had tried Liferea, but it's still too buggy for me. The promise of the new version of QuiteRSS to replace the Webkit engine with Chromium is encouraging too (they're already working on this version). We all know how updates for Webkit are an issue, so am really looking forward to the new version - Not that I'm unhappy with the current, I like it!
There is a new version since 02.07.2019
Good layout and speed, easy sharing and ability to create macros and import OPML files.
summary: Probably the best desktop RSS reader for my purposes

description: I added a feed. Exit QuiteRSS. Open it again and How, all is empty. :((((
Simple and practical. Personally the one I was looking for. Only issue is that i can't upgrade it to the last version (0.19.2)
Good layout and speed, easy sharing and ability to create macros and import OPML files.
better than any thing else

With QuiteRSS offering a range of extra settings such as proxy, the RSS reader suffers few quirks that would have been 5 stars. Opening an article remains elaborate with use the T key to open a new tab. Why not double click and open? While custom views were easy to apply, quick overal settings were missing. Have the whole QuiteRSS in larger fonts and viewing pleasure? That's some work to apply for each of the views. Nevertheless, a worthy program to keep and maintain. --recommend!
there is a new version out there but unable to upgrade it from 0.19.3 to 0.19.4
summary: Noway to upgrade to latest version

description: I am using Linux version of Quite RSS. It is a good app and very simple.
Setup is simple. Updating is simple. Very nice program.
There is a new version again in Apr 2020. It seems ubuntu software UI is unable to keep up with latest version in the ppa
Confusing to use.

Really like this newsreader - it does everything you'd want such a reader to do, with plenty of configurable features.

The ONLY negative would be the 0.19.4 update is missing form the 20.04 repository. I used it under 18.04 with no problem, so it being missing is odd.

I was quite pleased to discover that not only does this RSS reader give you the option of loading/not loading images by default, it allows you to set this option *per feed* which is quite convenient when one has a mix of comics and news feeds. Great job, app makers!
Simple, Fast, Easy To Use. Created Some Export And Import Functions To Use It Together With https://Start.YourBlog.Today/ Works Really Well!
I have tried various RSS applications in the past. QuiteRSS is simple and user friendly. I highly recommend it.
does not work..no news downloading

I tried Liferea, and it gave problems. Then I tried Akkregator, and it was fine for a while, but then misbehaved.  So I switched to Quite, and for the moment, it seems to me better than Liferea and Akkregator. Quite does exactly what it is supposed to do, unlike the others.
QuiteRSS nutze ich schon seit vielen Jahren, ist für mich der beste und schnellste Feedreader. Die Version 0.19.3 läuft bei mir stabil.
stürzt ständig ab
Aunque su funcionalidad y apariencia son muy buenos, pide mucha actualización y se cierra sin razón aparente,... tuve que reemplazarlo por Liferea.

Está bastante bien, pero es verdad que no es compatible con todos los rss que he encontrado. Tengo un Rss de un periódico que cuando accedes al detalle de cualquier noticia, la aplicación se cuelga. Por lo demás está muy bien.

Me gusta como funciona.
La opción que necesito incluyan (compartir por Telegram) se incorporó el la nueva versión que aún no se refleja. 
Espero se actualice pronto.
no me la boy a descar gar y bamos a ver
summary: me boy a sumar con la idea

description: je l'utilise depuis de nombreuses années.
Не качает новости, качает заголовки - бред
Удобный, пользуюсь несколько лет.
Мне пришелся по нраву, очень удобный. Спасибо разработчикам.
Постоянно пользуюсь им . Долго искал RSS ридер . Остановлися и не собираюсь менять этот .
лучшее что есть для линукс и виндовс после фиддемона
比较好用，但是感觉功能没有 Liferea 强大。
